name: OutputFormatInfo
summary: Helpers for output format detection and metadata.

methods.name: GetKind
methods.summary: Returns the output kind for a given format.

methods.name: IsText
methods.summary: Returns true when the format is textual.

methods.name: IsBinary
methods.summary: Returns true when the format is binary.

methods.name: GetDefaultExtension
methods.summary: Returns the default file extension (without a leading dot) for a format.

methods.name: GetMimeType
methods.summary: Returns a MIME type for the format when known.

methods.name: FromPath
methods.summary: Detects the output format from a file path.

methods.name: FromExtension
methods.summary: Detects the output format from a file extension (with or without a leading dot).

methods.name: Resolve
methods.summary: Detects the format from a path and falls back to a default if unknown.
